import Parsley from 'parsleyjs';
import validationMessages from '../../00-data/form/validation-messages.js';
 
class CheckoutPage {
	constructor($el) {
		Parsley.addMessages('de', validationMessages);
		Parsley.setLocale('de');
 
		let formBillingIsValid = false;
		let formShippingIsValid = false;
		let formIsValid = false;
 
		$el.find('.js-t-checkout__form').parsley().on('form:validate', ((formInstance) => {
			const isShipping = $('#form-checkout-is-shipping').is(':checked');
			formBillingIsValid = formInstance.isValid({ group: 'billingaddress', force: false });
 
			if (isShipping) {
				formShippingIsValid = formInstance.isValid({ group: 'shippingaddress', force: false });
			}
 
			if ((formBillingIsValid && (isShipping === false)) ||
				(formBillingIsValid && isShipping && formShippingIsValid)) {
				formIsValid = true;
			}
 
			formInstance.validationResult = formIsValid; // eslint-disable-line no-param-reassign
 
			if (formInstance.validationResult) {
				formInstance.$element.get(0).submit();
			}
		}));
	}
}
 
// TODO: city, validation for letter, hyphen and blank characters only.
// TODO: housenumber, validation min one number, letters allowed and one number required.
// TODO: password confirmation, remove error message on focus
 
export default CheckoutPage;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Aug 28 2017 16:13:34 GMT+0200 (CEST)
